title: Bug 18268 - Not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories
description: Bug 18268 - Not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories build 200205291235
OB: When opening the about dialog, it does not display the main image as expected.
EB: Open the about dialog. Observe: There is no main image. Expectation: It should have found it in NL-specific subdirectories.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Exit eclipse.
2. Copy the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif down into an NL-specific subdirectory; i.e., move it to <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif.
3. Start eclipse.
